programme.title: Gold Standard Ep3
programme.desc: "The Clash of Titans" – Croatia 2009 In 2009, France defeated Croatia in Zagreb to secure their third world title. This episode focuses on the iconic duel between Karabatić and Balić, as well as Claude Onesta’s tactical genius that defined the “Experts” era.

programme.title: The Art of lighting the Asian Games Flame
programme.desc: The Asian Games torch lighting has become a stage for innovation, blending tradition with modern spectacle. From iconic moments to dazzling surprises, none stand out more than Doha 2006 with its dramatic horse and rider. As the 2026 Games approach in Japan, anticipation grows for the next unforgettable torch lighting ceremony.

programme.title: The Art of lighting the Asian Games Flame
programme.desc: The Asian Games torch lighting has become a stage for innovation, blending tradition with modern spectacle. programme.title: FK Bodø/Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: The only previous meetings between Bodø/Glimt and Tottenham came in May of this year, with the English side winning home and away in the UEFA Europa League semi-finals, before going on to lift the trophy. Bodø/Glimt have lost 100% of their games against English sides in major European competition ; their worst losing record against sides from a single nation. All of those defeats have come in the UEFA Europa League since the 2022-23 campaign.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won seven of their last eight Premier League meetings with Fulham, including their last five in a row since a 3-0 defeat in October 2022. The Villans last won six successive league meetings against any side when doing so versus rivals Birmingham City from October 2005 to April 2010. Fulham have won just one of their last 21 away league games at Aston Villa, losing their last six in a row since a 2-1 win in April 2014.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won seven of their last eight Premier League meetings with Fulham, including their last five in a row since a 3-0 defeat in October 2022. The Villans last won six successive league meetings against any side when doing so versus rivals Birmingham City from October 2005 to April 2010. Fulham have won just one of their last 21 away league games at Aston Villa, losing their last six in a row since a 2-1 win in April 2014.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match

programme.title: Galatasaray vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Galatasaray and Liverpool will meet for a fifth time in European competition, with both sides managing one victory apiece across the previous four. This will be their first game against each other since a 3-2 win for Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League in December 2006. Liverpool are winless in their previous two away trips to face Galatasaray, 1-1 in February 2002 and losing 3-2 in December 2006. The only teams they’ve faced away from home more often in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League without winning are Chelsea and Napoli.

programme.title: Spirit of Sport 2025
programme.desc: Intended to reflect the diversity of content across the Laureus network, the multi-media content series will deliver premium content and unrivalled storytelling to global audiences, capitalising on Laureus’ access to the world’s biggest sporting names. Spirit of Sport will produce rolling, ‘must see’ content focused around exclusive interviews with global sports stars as well as access to major sporting events. programme.title: Gemma TRIAY PONS ESP Delfina BREA SENESI ARG vs Ariana SANCHEZ FALLADA ESP Paula JOSEMARIA MARTIN ES
programme.desc: Delfi Brea/Gemma Triay meet Ari Sánchez/Paula Josemaría on Centre Court in Düsseldorf. Brea/Triay arrive in top form, seeking an eighth title of 2025; Sánchez/Josemaría, the season’s No.1 team, bring pace, variety and fierce net play. Look for tactical lobs, sharp switches, and momentum swings in a championship match with ranking stakes.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Alejandro GALAN ESP Federico CHINGOTTO ARG - Men’s Final - Pr
programme.desc: World No.1 Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia face No.2 Alejandro Galán/Federico Chingotto at Düsseldorf’s CASTELLO. Recent wins in Bordeaux and Brussels give Coello/Tapia the edge, but Galán/Chingotto’s pressure returns and countering keep this rivalry razor tight. Expect golden-point drama as the title and vital ranking points are decided on Centre Court.

programme.title: Tractor FC (IRN) vs Al Wahda FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Tractor and Al Wahda; Tractor are unbeaten in home games against sides from UAE in the competition, while Al Wahda are winless in away matches against sides from Iran in the tournament. Al Wahda won their opening game of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign for the first time since 2007, beating Al-Ittihad 2-1 on the opening matchday of the 2025-26 season; the only other time they won their first two matches of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign was also in 2007.

programme.title: Tractor FC (IRN) vs Al Wahda FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Tractor and Al Wahda; Tractor are unbeaten in home games against sides from UAE in the competition, while Al Wahda are winless in away matches against sides from Iran in the tournament. Al Wahda won their opening game of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign for the first time since 2007, beating Al-Ittihad 2-1 on the opening matchday of the 2025-26 season; the only other time they won their first two matches of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign was also in 2007.

programme.title: Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Duhail have won only one of their previous four AFC Champions League Elite games against Al-Ahli, however, this win did come in their only home game in the competition against the Saudi Arabia team. Al Duhail lost their opening game of AFC Champions League Elite 2025-26 1-2 against Al-Hilal; they have lost each of their last four games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition, conceding a total of 16 goals in these games.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Football Cases : HAS Guardiola Killed Football ?
programme.desc: Guardiola was a pioneer as a coach. A highly modern vision of football, he experienced both success and disappointment. Many coaches tried to imitate him, but very few succeeded. Has Guardiola kill football?

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: PFC Nasaf (UZB) vs Al Hilal SFC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first fixture in AFC Champions League Elite between Nasaf and Al-Hilal, Nasaf have won just one of their eight games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition and are winless in their last four such games. Al-Hilal have lost just one of their 14 group stage games against teams from Uzbekistan in AFC Champions League Elite history, a 1-2 loss to FK Mash’al Mubarek in 2006; they have scored in each of their 14 such games in the competition, scoring at least twice in 11 of these.

programme.title: Al Gharafa SC (QAT) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al Gharafa and Al Shorta in the AFC Champions League Elite; Al Gharafa is winless in their two encounters against Iraqi sides in the competition while Al Shorta is unbeaten in their last two games against Qatari sides. Al Gharafa won their most recent home game in the AFC Champions League Elite, the last time they won back-to-back home games in the competition was a run of three games between May 2012 and April 2013; they kept a clean sheet in their previous home game, they have never recorded back-to-back clean sheets at home in the competition.

programme.title: Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Duhail have won only one of their previous four AFC Champions League Elite games against Al-Ahli, however, this win did come in their only home game in the competition against the Saudi Arabia team. Al Duhail lost their opening game of AFC Champions League Elite 2025-26 1-2 against Al-Hilal; they have lost each of their last four games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition, conceding a total of 16 goals in these games.

programme.title: All Goals UEFA Champions League 2025/2026
programme.desc: All the goals in match day 1 of UEFA Champions league for season 2025-2026.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Kairat’s game against Real Madrid will be the just the second fixture played between sides from Kazakhstan and Spain in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, after Astana’s meetings with Atlético Madrid in the 2015-16 group stage. Real Madrid have only lost three of the last 30 instances when facing a team for the first time in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, suffering defeats against Lille in 2024, Sheriff Tiraspol in 2021 and Wolfsburg in 2016.

programme.title: Galatasaray vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Galatasaray and Liverpool will meet for a fifth time in European competition, with both sides managing one victory apiece across the previous four. This will be their first game against each other since a 3-2 win for Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League in December 2006. Liverpool are winless in their previous two away trips to face Galatasaray, 1-1 in February 2002 and losing 3-2 in December 2006. The only teams they’ve faced away from home more often in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League without winning are Chelsea and Napoli.

programme.title: Brentford vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: PFC Nasaf (UZB) vs Al Hilal SFC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first fixture in AFC Champions League Elite between Nasaf and Al-Hilal, Nasaf have won just one of their eight games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition and are winless in their last four such games. Al-Hilal have lost just one of their 14 group stage games against teams from Uzbekistan in AFC Champions League Elite history, a 1-2 loss to FK Mash’al Mubarek in 2006; they have scored in each of their 14 such games in the competition, scoring at least twice in 11 of these.

programme.title: Al Gharafa SC (QAT) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al Gharafa and Al Shorta in the AFC Champions League Elite; Al Gharafa is winless in their two encounters against Iraqi sides in the competition while Al Shorta is unbeaten in their last two games against Qatari sides. Al Gharafa won their most recent home game in the AFC Champions League Elite, the last time they won back-to-back home games in the competition was a run of three games between May 2012 and April 2013; they kept a clean sheet in their previous home game, they have never recorded back-to-back clean sheets at home in the competition.

programme.title: Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Duhail have won only one of their previous four AFC Champions League Elite games against Al-Ahli, however, this win did come in their only home game in the competition against the Saudi Arabia team. Al Duhail lost their opening game of AFC Champions League Elite 2025-26 1-2 against Al-Hilal; they have lost each of their last four games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition, conceding a total of 16 goals in these games.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Kairat’s game against Real Madrid will be the just the second fixture played between sides from Kazakhstan and Spain in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, after Astana’s meetings with Atlético Madrid in the 2015-16 group stage. Real Madrid have only lost three of the last 30 instances when facing a team for the first time in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, suffering defeats against Lille in 2024, Sheriff Tiraspol in 2021 and Wolfsburg in 2016.

programme.title: Galatasaray vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Galatasaray and Liverpool will meet for a fifth time in European competition, with both sides managing one victory apiece across the previous four. This will be their first game against each other since a 3-2 win for Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League in December 2006. Liverpool are winless in their previous two away trips to face Galatasaray, 1-1 in February 2002 and losing 3-2 in December 2006. The only teams they’ve faced away from home more often in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League without winning are Chelsea and Napoli.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Bologna - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This is the second consecutive season to see Aston Villa face Bologna in European competition – the Villans won 2-0 in last season’s UEFA Champions League at Villa Park. Bologna are winless in their last five European games against English opponents since a 1-0 win over Leeds United in March 1967 in the Inter-Cities Fairs Cup.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Nottingham Forest - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever meeting between Real Betis and Nottingham Forest – the Spanish side have lost seven of nine previous European games against English teams, losing most recently in the 2025 UEFA Conference League final to Chelsea. In major European competition, Nottingham Forest’s only previous meeting with a Spanish club was in the Fairs Cup first round in 1961-62, losing 7-1 on aggregate to Valencia.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Spurs striker Richarlison has scored six goals in 12 Premier League games against Wolves – against no side has he netted more in the competition. programme.title: Aston Villa vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won seven of their last eight Premier League meetings with Fulham, including their last five in a row since a 3-0 defeat in October 2022. The Villans last won six successive league meetings against any side when doing so versus rivals Birmingham City from October 2005 to April 2010. Fulham have won just one of their last 21 away league games at Aston Villa, losing their last six in a row since a 2-1 win in April 2014.

programme.title: Tractor FC (IRN) vs Al Wahda FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Tractor and Al Wahda; Tractor are unbeaten in home games against sides from UAE in the competition, while Al Wahda are winless in away matches against sides from Iran in the tournament. Al Wahda won their opening game of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign for the first time since 2007, beating Al-Ittihad 2-1 on the opening matchday of the 2025-26 season; the only other time they won their first two matches of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign was also in 2007.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Al Sadd SC (QAT) vs Sharjah FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Sadd are unbeaten in each of their previous two meetings with Sharjah in the AFC Champions League Elite, while keeping a clean sheet in both of those games; in fact, Al Sadd are unbeaten in each of their last 16 games against sides from UAE in the competition. Sharjah have conceded multiple goals in each of their last three games in the AFC Champions League Elite, including their opening game of the ongoing edition ; if they concede multiple goals in this game, they will equal their longest such run in the competition.

programme.title: Al Ittihad Club (KSA) vs Shabab Al Ahli (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al-Ittihad and Shabab Al Ahli in AFC Champions League Elite history; teams from Saudi Arabia have won seven of their last eight games in the competition against teams from UAE, however, the one loss in this run was Al-Ittihad’s 1-2 loss to Al Wahda in their opening matchday of the 2025-26 season. Al-Ittihad have lost each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite games, their joint-longest run of such games in the competition, including a 1-2 loss to Al Wahda on Matchday 1; Al-Ittihad have never lost each of their first two games of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign and only twice have they failed to win any of their first two games.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Osasuna - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Real Betis have won six and drawn one of their last seven home games against Osasuna in LaLiga, their best unbeaten run against the Navarrese side in the competition since their first 14 encounters on home soil between 1935 and 1989. programme.title: Valencia vs Real Oviedo - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Valencia have not lost any of their last nine matches against Real Oviedo in LaLiga – although they have drawn five of them – the longest unbeaten run against the Asturian side in their history in the top-flight. Real Oviedo have only kept a clean sheet in one of their last 36 away games against Valencia CF in LaLiga : a 1-0 win in September 1988 with Vicente Miera as manager, in what was their last away victory against them in the top-flight.

programme.title: Atalanta vs Club Brugge KV - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: This will be the second consecutive campaign in which Atalanta and Club Brugge will face each other, with the Belgian sided winning both meetings in the 2024-25 UEFA Champions League play-off round. Atalanta only lost three of their 10 matches in the UEFA Champions League last season, while two of those three were inflicted by Club Brugge. The Italians lost more games in the play-off round than they did across eight games in the league phase.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Eintracht Frankfurt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Atlético Madrid and Eintracht Frankfurt in European competition, with the previous two coming in the last 16 of the 1975-76 Cup Winners’ Cup, and both won by the German side. The last German side to win away to Atlético Madrid in major European competition was Borussia Dortmund in October 1996. Since then, Atlético are unbeaten in 14 such matches, winning 10 of them.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Slavia Praha - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Internazionale and Slavia Prague in European competition, with the previous two also coming in the UEFA Champions League in the 2019-20 group stage – Inter drew 1-1 at home, before winning 3-1 in the reverse fixture on the road. programme.title: Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) vs PFC Nasaf (UZB) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al-Ahli and Nasaf, with Nasaf’s only win coming in their most recent such game on 2 March 2016 ; Al-Ahli’s most recent game in the competition against Uzbek opposition was a 2-1 win over Pakhtakor Tashkent on 20 May 2019, a win here will see them win two consecutive such games for the first time in competition history. programme.title: Pafos FC vs Bayern München - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: This will be the 50th game between Cypriot and German teams in major European competition, while only on one previous occasion has a Cypriot side won : APOEL Nicosia 2-1 Berliner FC Dynamo in the European Cup first round in October 1980. Bayern Munich have won all six of their previous game against Cypriot sides in European competition, scoring 31 goals and only conceding twice across the six matches. The most recent of those, however, came back in October 1990 in a 4-0 win over APOEL Nicosia in the European Cup.

programme.title: Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) vs Shanghai Port FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD
programme.desc: This will be the first time Sanfrecce Hiroshima and Shanghai Port face off in the AFC Champions League Elite; Sanfrecce Hiroshima have won just two of their 10 games against opponents from China in the competition, with a win in their most recent such game. Shanghai Port are currently on a five-game losing streak in the AFC Champions League Elite, last registering a win on 26 November 2024 ; in fact, they have lost each of their last seven games in the competition against opponents from Japan.

programme.title: Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) vs Shanghai Port FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD

programme.title: Chengdu Rongcheng FC vs Gangwon FC (KOR) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2
programme.desc: Chengdu Rongcheng will face Gangwon for the first time in AFC Champions League Elite; each of the last three games in the competition between teams from Korea and China have been won by the former by an exact 2-1 score, including Gangwon’s win over Shanghai Shenhua in the first round of the 2025-26 season. Gangwon beat Shanghai Shenhua 2-1 in their first ever AFC Champions League Elite game at home; the last Korean side to suffer at least one defeat in their first two games in the competition is Jeju United in 2011, while no side from Korea has suffered defeat in their first away game in the AFC Champions League Elite.

Race - Session 1 Part 1 - Fuji Round - 2025 FIA World Endurance Championship
programme.desc: The FIA WEC returns to Europe for Round 2 at the historic Imola circuit. Top manufacturers like Ferrari, Toyota, and Porsche compete in a six-hour endurance battle, navigating 21 challenging turns over 4.9 km. programme.title: FC Seoul (KOR) vs Buriram United (THA) -AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2
programme.desc: FC Seoul are unbeaten in each of their four meetings against Buriram United in the AFC Champions League Elite, including wins in each of their last two; in fact, FC Seoul have lost just one of their six meetings against Thai sides in the competition, with the loss coming in their most recent such game. programme.title: Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) vs FC Machida Zelvia (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East
programme.desc: Johor Darul Ta’zim will be playing against Machida Zelvia for the first time in AFC Champions League history; Johor Darul Ta’zim are winless in their last seven games in the competition against teams from Japan, failing to score in each of the last five of these games. Machida Zelvia are the fifth Japanese club to start their debut AFC Champions League Elite campaign with a draw ; the last two such participants gained at least one point in their second game.

programme.title: Young Boys vs Panathinaikos - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Young Boys and Panathinaikos in European competition – YB’s only previous meeting with Greek opposition came in the 2016-17 UEFA Europa League group stage, losing 1-0 at home and drawing 1-1 away with Olympiakos. Panathinaikos’ only previous encounter with a Swiss opponent in European competition came in the 1974-75 UEFA Cup, losing 3-2 on aggregate to Grasshopper Club Zurich in the first round.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Benfica - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Chelsea have won all four of their competitive meetings with Benfica, with the most recent of those coming earlier this year at the FIFA Club World Cup. This will be the first meeting between Chelsea and Benfica in the group/league phase of a competition, with the previous four all having come in the knockout stages: UEFA Champions League quarter-finals in 2011-12, UEFA Europa League final in 2012-13 and the FIFA Club World Cup last 16 earlier this year.

programme.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Ajax - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Marseille lost their first three meetings with Ajax in European competition, but have since gone unbeaten across the last five, most recently beating them in November 2023. Marseille and Ajax were drawn together in the group stage of a major European competition as recently as 2023-24, in the UEFA Europa League. Their two meetings that season produced a total of 13 goals, 64 shots, and 33 shots on target – all of which were the most in any fixture in this group stage.

programme.title: Atalanta vs Club Brugge KV - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: This will be the second consecutive campaign in which Atalanta and Club Brugge will face each other, with the Belgian sided winning both meetings in the 2024-25 UEFA Champions League play-off round. Atalanta only lost three of their 10 matches in the UEFA Champions League last season, while two of those three were inflicted by Club Brugge. The Italians lost more games in the play-off round than they did across eight games in the league phase.

programme.title: Montpellier vs Limoges - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Red Bull Ring Part 1
programme.desc: DTM. The embodiment of Motorsport tradition. Having just turned 40, the DTM combines a unique fascination and familiarity with an unmistakable dynamic, signified by the rebranding with a new logo! Seven different manufacturers – ten different winners on six brands (Audi, BMW, Mercedes, Lamborghini, Porsche and Ferrari) through twelve races are but one testament to the unique competitive balance that makes every DTM weekend a revelation! And with the addition of Ford, the palette of different brands is only increasing!

programme.title: Day 3 - QTerminals Qatar Classic 2025 -PSA
programme.desc: QTerminals Qatar Classic 2025 delivers world-class squash from Doha as the PSA World Tour returns to the Khalifa International Tennis & Squash Complex. Daily Glass Court action showcases fast-paced rallies, precision shot-making, and high-stakes matches from early rounds through the final.

programme.title: M5 -Men - Premier Padel - Rotterdam P1
programme.desc: Elite indoor padel from Rotterdam Ahoy. A P1-tier event for men and women featuring the world’s top pairs battling for major ranking points on a fast court. Expect explosive volleys, aerial smashes, and high-drama tiebreaks as the draw builds to a blockbuster finals day at one of Europe’s standout arenas.
